description: Search and browse 1,400+ Phosphor icons by name, category, or tags. Generate SVGs in six weights with custom color and size, or fetch multiple icons at once. Streamline UI design with a ready-to-use catalog and quick integration guidance.

capabilities.name: get-icon
capabilities.description: Retrieve one or more SVG icons from Phosphor Icons library. Provide either a single icon name or an array of names for batch retrieval. Returns SVG content with specified weight/style and optional color.

capabilities.name: search-icons
capabilities.description: Search for icons by name, category, or tags. Returns a list of matching icons.

capabilities.name: list-categories
capabilities.description: Get a list of all icon categories available in Phosphor Icons.
